data.description: Perl interface to the syssgi API
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Since the module is a Perl interface to the IRIX syssgi system call
    API, SGI::syssgi seemed like a good idea. I put it in the SGI:: root
    since this module is only available for the SGI IRIX platform.
